about.title: About AdVet
about.mission_text: AdVet is dedicated to providing high-quality veterinary medicines and products to animal care professionals across the region. We partner with certified manufacturers to ensure the safety and efficacy of every product we offer.
about.quality_desc: Every product is sourced from certified manufacturers with strict quality control.
about.trust_desc: Building long-term relationships with our clients through consistent service.
about.expertise_desc: Our team includes experienced veterinary professionals ready to assist you.
